title: UDA & Agri Ministry at COPE & COPA today (7)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Urban Development Authority summoned to the Committee on Public Enterprises (COPE) on Tuesday (7).
Meanwhile, the Ministry of Agriculture has been summoned to the Committee on Public Accounts (COPA) today (7) at 02.00 p.m.
Cabraal released on Rs. 10 Mn bail on Criminal Breach of Trust complaint
United States Organizes Workshop to help Sri Lanka Respond to Oil Spills
